thread.title: Watch the New Teaser Trailer for Deadpool 2
thread.title_full: Watch the New Teaser Trailer for Deadpool 2

author: Jon Levine
title: Watch the New Teaser Trailer for Deadpool 2
text:
Watch the New Teaser Trailer for Deadpool 2 by Jon Levine | 9:21 pm, March 4th, 2017 
Deadpool is back. 
The teaser trailer for Deadpool 2 has landed. The new flick, set for release in 2018, once again stars Ryan Reynolds in the title role. Reynolds posted a link to the trailer from his official YouTube page. 
The trailer reveals few details other than what looks to be a faithful reprisal of the original character. The spot did featured an appearance by the godfather of comic books, Stan Lee . The 94-year-old is serving as an executive producer on the film. 
Deadpool 2 is directed by David Leitch , and, in addition to Reynolds, will also probably star Nathan Summers, according to IMDB. 
Click above to watch the full trailer. 
This is an opinion piece. The views expressed in this article are those of just the author. Follow Mediaite
